problem:

[Question] What is unique about the structure of PolyAI?
[Answer]
answer: PolyAI has a geometric structure that resembles the letters "AI", and it consists of 1-(2,5-dimethylhex-3-yn-1-yl)-2-methylcycloprop-1-ene as its repeating unit.
pred: The unique feature of the structure of PolyAI is that it includes a central core surrounded by several smaller particles. This core and surrounding particles are connected by weak van der Waals forces. The structure of PolyAI resembles a molecule with an asymmetrical distribution of mass. The mass of the central core is larger than that of the surrounding particles. This asymmetry contributes to the unconventional plasmonic properties of PolyAI.
